document_data.Synopsis: In [[1492 DR]], a band of [[adventurer]]s begin to investigate the disappearance of a missing [[sage]] of Candlekeep, Great Reader [[A'lai Aivenmore]]. Their journey takes them to the [[House of the All-Seeing Orb]] temple in the far southern city of [[Tashluta]].
